alert.note: Alert for Southern Bristol (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued November 26 at 2:42AM EST until November 27 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Less than one half foot of inundation above ground level possible in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.4 to 6.6 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...In Massachusetts, Southern Bristol MA County. In Rhode Island, Southeast Providence RI, Eastern Kent RI, Bristol RI, Washington RI and Newport RI Counties. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday morning. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The highest risk for minor splashover will be along Narragansett Bay around high tide Monday morning. A peak surge around 2 ft is possible but this will likely occur before high tide which would minimize the flood threat. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
